title: National Girlfriend Day 💐
message:
These past three months apart have been tough, but they've shown us how strong our love really is. When you open this note, I’ll be just 7 days away from being home, ready to hold you close and make up for every moment we missed. I’m so excited to see your beautiful smile again and to love on you like never before. Counting down the days until we’re together again, Estef you mean the world to me!

Love,

Michael💖

title: First Unofficial Date Anniversary 💖
message: That day was the start of something beautiful. I cherish every moment since.

title: First Official Date Anniversary 💖
message: Officially mine, officially yours. Forever grateful for you.

title: Our 2-Year Anniversary 💖
message: I knew you were the one when I first saw you. I love you endlessly.

title: Valentine’s Day 💘
message: Can’t wait to celebrate together. You’re my forever Valentine.
